citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 5:45pm on 27-JUL-
22. The inspector spoke to a household member who stated no one was available for inspection.
End Section
